name: Loss: The Pilgrimage
description: Loss: The Pilgrimage is about a young boy and his father making a pilgrimage to a great mountain, as generations have before. On their journey the father must protect, and teach, his son how to survive the harsh world around them. As they make their journey you must fight with your son to get to the mountain. However, this journey has a great toll on the father. As they get closer, the father grows older, and each passing day makes it harder for him to protect his son. Survive the pilgrimage, protect your son.
